alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 07 at 3:33AM MST until March 07 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-quarter mile in dense fog at times. Areas of freezing drizzle will also occur, producing slick spots on area roads. * WHERE...The Interstate 80 corridor from Laramie to Cheyenne to Sidney. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
